adapter.Use same DB - Tooltip: Use the same DB as Casdoor

application.Auto signin - Tooltip: When a logged-in session exists in Casdoor, it is automatically used for application-side login
application.Background URL - Tooltip: URL of the background image used in the login page
application.Custom CSS - Tooltip: CSS styling of the signup, signin and forget password forms (e.g. adding borders and shadows)
application.Enable Email linking - Tooltip: When using 3rd-party providers to log in, if there is a user in the organization with the same Email, the 3rd-party login method will be automatically associated with that user
application.Enable SAML C14N10 - Tooltip: Use C14N10 instead of C14N11 in SAML
application.Enable SAML POST binding - Tooltip: The HTTP POST binding uses input fields in a HTML form to send SAML messages, Enable when your SP use it
application.Enable SAML compression - Tooltip: Whether to compress SAML response messages when Casdoor is used as SAML idp
application.Enable signin session - Tooltip: Whether Casdoor maintains a session after logging into Casdoor from the application
application.Enable signup - Tooltip: Whether to allow users to register a new account
application.Footer HTML - Tooltip: Custom the footer of your application
application.Form position - Tooltip: Location of the signup, signin and forget password forms
application.Grant types - Tooltip: Select which grant types are allowed in the OAuth protocol
application.Header HTML - Tooltip: Custom the head tag of your application entry page
application.MFA remember time - Tooltip: Configures the duration that a account is remembered as trusted after a successful MFA login
application.Please enable \\\"Signin session\\\" fir: Please enable \"Signin session\" first before enabling \"Auto signin\"
application.Redirect URL (Assertion Consumer Service: Redirect URL (Assertion Consumer Service POST Binding URL)
application.Redirect URLs - Tooltip: Allowed redirect URL list, supporting regular expression matching; URLs not in the list will fail to redirect
application.Side panel HTML - Tooltip: Customize the HTML code for the side panel of the login page
application.Signin items - Tooltip: Items for users to fill in when signing up
application.Signup items - Tooltip: Items for users to fill in when registering new accounts
application.Tags - Tooltip: Only users with the tag that is listed in the application tags can login
application.The application does not allow to sign u: The application does not allow to sign up new account
application.Token fields - Tooltip: The user fields included in the token
application.Token signing method - Tooltip: Signing method of JWT token, needs to be the same algorithm as the certificate
application.You are unexpected to see this prompt pa: You are unexpected to see this prompt page

cert.Certificate - Tooltip: Public key certificate, used for decrypting the JWT signature of the Access Token. This certificate usually needs to be deployed on the Casdoor SDK side (i.e., the application) to parse the JWT
cert.Crypto algorithm - Tooltip: Encryption algorithm used by the certificate
cert.Expire in years - Tooltip: Validity period of the certificate, in years
cert.Private key - Tooltip: Private key corresponding to the public key certificate

code.Please input your phone verification cod: Please input your phone verification code!

general.Adapter - Tooltip: Table name of the policy store
general.Affiliation URL - Tooltip: The homepage URL for the affiliation
general.Avatar - Tooltip: Public avatar image for the user
general.Cert - Tooltip: The public key certificate that needs to be verified by the client SDK corresponding to this application
general.Default application - Tooltip: Default application for users registered directly from the organization page
general.Default avatar - Tooltip: Default avatar used when newly registered users do not set an avatar image
general.Default password - Tooltip: When adding new user, if the user's password is not specified, the default password will be used as the user's password
general.Description - Tooltip: Detailed description information for reference, Casdoor itself will not use it
general.Display name - Tooltip: A user-friendly, easily readable name displayed publicly in the UI
general.Favicon - Tooltip: Favicon icon URL used in all Casdoor pages of the organization
general.Forget URL - Tooltip: Custom URL for the "Forget password" page. If not set, the default Casdoor "Forget password" page will be used. When set, the "Forget password" link on the login page will redirect to this URL
general.Found some texts still not translated? P: Found some texts still not translated? Please help us translate at
general.Is shared - Tooltip: Share this application with other organizations
general.Logo - Tooltip: Icons that the application presents to the outside world
general.Logo dark - Tooltip: The logo used in dark theme
general.Master password - Tooltip: Can be used to log in to all users under this organization, making it convenient for administrators to log in as this user to solve technical issues
general.Master verification code - Tooltip: When the master verification code is set, all email and SMS verification codes sent under this organization will use this fixed code. It's mainly used for automated testing and CI purposes and is generally not used in normal environments
general.Name: Name
general.Organization - Tooltip: Similar to concepts such as tenants or user pools, each user and application belongs to an organization
general.Password - Tooltip: Make sure the password is correct
general.Password complexity options - Tooltip: Different combinations of password complexity options
general.Password salt - Tooltip: Random parameter used for password encryption
general.Password type - Tooltip: Storage format of passwords in the database
general.Provider - Tooltip: Payment providers to be configured, including PayPal, Alipay, WeChat Pay, etc.
general.Providers - Tooltip: Providers to be configured, including 3rd-party login, object storage, verification code, etc.
general.Roles - Tooltip: Roles that the user belongs to
general.SSH type - Tooltip: The auth type of SSH connection
general.Signin URL - Tooltip: Custom URL for the login page. If not set, the default Casdoor login page will be used. When set, the login links on various Casdoor pages will redirect to this URL
general.Signup URL - Tooltip: Custom URL for the registration page. If not set, the default Casdoor registration page will be used. When set, the registration links on various Casdoor pages will redirect to this URL
general.Signup application - Tooltip: Which application the user registered through when they signed up
general.Sorry, the page you visited does not exi: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist.
general.Sorry, the user you visited does not exi: Sorry, the user you visited does not exist or you are not authorized to access this user.
general.Sorry, you do not have permission to acc: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page or logged in status invalid.
general.Supported country codes - Tooltip: Country codes supported by the organization. These codes can be selected as a prefix when sending SMS verification codes
There was a problem signing you in..
general.This is a read-only demo site!: This is a read-only demo site!
general.User - Tooltip: Make sure the username is correct
general.User type - Tooltip: Tags that the user belongs to, defaulting to "normal-user"
general.You can only select one physical group: You can only select one physical group

You need to delete all subgroups first. You can view the subgroups in the left group tree of the [Organizations] -> [Groups] page

invitation.Code - Tooltip: Can be a single string as an invitation code, or a regular expression. All strings matching the regular expression are valid invitation codes
invitation.Default code - Tooltip: When the invitation code is a regular expression, please enter the invitation code that matches the regular expression rule as the default invitation code for the invitation link
invitation.Quota - Tooltip: The maximum number of users that can register using this invitation code
invitation.Used count - Tooltip: The number of times this invitation code has been used
invitation.You need to first specify a default appl: You need to first specify a default application for organization:

ldap.Admin - Tooltip: CN or ID of the LDAP server administrator
ldap.Default group - Tooltip: Group to which users belong after synchronization
ldap.The Auto Sync option will sync all users: The Auto Sync option will sync all users to specify organization

login.Or sign in with another account: Or sign in with another account
login.Please ensure sufficient lighting and al: Please ensure sufficient lighting and align your face in the center of the recognition box
login.Please ensure that you have a camera dev: Please ensure that you have a camera device for facial recognition
login.Please input your Email or Phone!: Please input your Email or Phone!
login.Please load the webpage using HTTPS, oth: Please load the webpage using HTTPS, otherwise the camera cannot be accessed
login.Please provide permission to access the: Please provide permission to access the camera
login.Please select an organization to sign in: Please select an organization to sign in
login.Please type an organization to sign in: Please type an organization to sign in
login.Successfully logged in with WebAuthn cre: Successfully logged in with WebAuthn credentials
login.The camera is currently in use by anothe: The camera is currently in use by another webpage
login.The input is not valid Email or phone nu: The input is not valid Email or phone number!
login.The input is not valid Email!: The input is not valid Email!
login.The input is not valid phone number!: The input is not valid phone number!

mfa.Each time you sign in to your Account, y: Each time you sign in to your Account, you'll need your password and a authentication code
mfa.Or copy the secret to your Authenticator: Or copy the secret to your Authenticator App
mfa.Please bind your email first, the system: Please bind your email first, the system will automatically uses the mail for multi-factor authentication
mfa.Please bind your phone first, the system: Please bind your phone first, the system automatically uses the phone for multi-factor authentication
mfa.Please save this recovery code. Once you: Please save this recovery code. Once your device cannot provide an authentication code, you can reset mfa authentication by this recovery code
mfa.Protect your account with Multi-factor a: Protect your account with Multi-factor authentication
mfa.Scan the QR code with your Authenticator: Scan the QR code with your Authenticator App
mfa.To ensure the security of your account,: To ensure the security of your account, it is recommended that you enable multi-factor authentication
To ensure the security of your account, it is required to enable multi-factor authentication
mfa.You have enabled Multi-Factor Authentica: You have enabled Multi-Factor Authentication, Please click 'Send Code' to continue
You have enabled Multi-Factor Authentication, please enter the TOTP code

model.Model text - Tooltip: Casbin access control model, including built-in models like ACL, RBAC, ABAC, RESTful, etc. You can also create custom models. For more information, please visit the Casbin website

organization.Account items - Tooltip: Items in the Personal settings page
organization.Has privilege consent - Tooltip: Prevent adding users for built-in organization if HasPrivilegeConsent is false
organization.Has privilege consent warning: Adding a new user to the 'built-in' organization is currently disabled. Please note: all users in the 'built-in' organization are global administrators in Casdoor. Refer to the docs: https://casdoor.org/docs/basic/core-concepts#how-does-casdoor-manage-itself. If you still wish to create a user for the 'built-in' organization, go to the organization's settings page and enable the 'Has privilege consent' option.
organization.Init score - Tooltip: Initial score points awarded to users upon registration
organization.Is profile public - Tooltip: After being closed, only global administrators or users in the same organization can access the user's profile page
organization.Soft deletion - Tooltip: When enabled, deleting users will not completely remove them from the database. Instead, they will be marked as deleted
organization.Tags - Tooltip: Collection of tags available for users to choose from
organization.Use Email as username - Tooltip: Use Email as username if the username field is not visible at signup
organization.Website URL - Tooltip: The homepage URL of the organization. This field is not used in Casdoor

payment.Invoice actions - Tooltip: Operations include issuing invoices and downloading invoices
payment.Invoice remark - Tooltip: The remark should not exceed 50 characters
payment.Invoice tax ID - Tooltip: When the invoice type is for an organization, the organization taxpayer identification number must be entered; when the invoice type is for an individual, it is not necessary to fill in this information
payment.Invoice title - Tooltip: When the invoice type is for an organization, the invoice title can be entered as the organization name; when the invoice type is for an individual, the system will automatically fill in the payer's name
payment.Invoice type - Tooltip: The invoice type can be for an individual or an organization
payment.Person ID card - Tooltip: ID card number of the payer
payment.Person phone - Tooltip: The phone number of the payer
payment.Please carefully check your invoice info: Please carefully check your invoice information. Once the invoice is issued, it cannot be withdrawn or modified.
payment.Please click the below button to return: Please click the below button to return to the original website
payment.The payment is still under processing: The payment is still under processing
payment.Type - Tooltip: Payment method used when purchasing the product
payment.You have successfully completed the paym: You have successfully completed the payment
please wait for a few seconds...

permission.Approve time - Tooltip: The time of approval for this permission
permission.Approver - Tooltip: The person who approved the permission
permission.Submitter - Tooltip: The person applying for this permission

plan.Price - Tooltip: Price needs to pay to subscribe the plan

pricing.paid-user do not have active subscriptio: paid-user do not have active subscription or pending subscription, please select a plan to buy

product.Is recharge - Tooltip: Whether the current product is to recharge balance
product.Return URL - Tooltip: URL to return to after successful purchase
product.Success URL - Tooltip: URL to return to after purchase
product.There is no payment channel for this pro: There is no payment channel for this product.
This product is currently not in sale.

provider.DB test - Tooltip: Test the connectivity to the database
provider.Disable SSL - Tooltip: Whether to disable SSL protocol when communicating with STMP server
provider.Follow-up action - Tooltip: If you choose "Use WeChat Open Platform to login", users need to login on the WeChat Open Platform after following the wechat official account.
provider.Get phone number - Tooltip: If sync phone number is enabled, you should enable google people api first and add scope https://www.googleapis.com/auth/user.phonenumbers.read
provider.Method - Tooltip: Login method, QR code or silent login
provider.Path prefix - Tooltip: Bucket path prefix for object storage
provider.Please use WeChat to scan the QR code an: Please use WeChat to scan the QR code and follow the official account for sign in
provider.Port - Tooltip: Make sure the port is open
provider.Provider URL - Tooltip: URL for configuring the service provider, this field is only used for reference and is not used in Casdoor
provider.Region ID - Tooltip: Region ID for the service provider
provider.SMS Test - Tooltip: Phone number for sending test SMS
provider.Secret key - Tooltip: Used by the server to call the verification code provider API for verification
provider.Service account JSON - Tooltip: The JSON file content for the service account
provider.Sign Name - Tooltip: Name of the signature to be used
provider.Sign request - Tooltip: Whether the request requires a signature
provider.Signin HTML - Tooltip: Custom HTML for replacing the default signin page style
provider.Signup HTML - Tooltip: Custom HTML for replacing the default signup page style
provider.Subject: Subject
provider.Test Email - Tooltip: Email address to receive test mails
provider.Use WeChat Media Platform in PC: Use WeChat Media Platform in PC
provider.Use WeChat Media Platform in PC - Toolti: Whether to allow scanning WeChat Media Platform QR code to login
provider.Use WeChat Media Platform to login: Use WeChat Media Platform to login
provider.Use WeChat Open Platform to login: Use WeChat Open Platform to login

role.Sub domains - Tooltip: Domains included in the current role
role.Sub groups - Tooltip: Groups included in the current role
role.Sub roles - Tooltip: Roles included in the current role
role.Sub users - Tooltip: Users included in the current role

signup.Label: Label
signup.Please click the below button to sign in: Please click the below button to sign in

signup.Please input your ID card number!: Please input your ID card number!
signup.Terms of Use - Tooltip: Terms of use that users need to read and agree to during registration

syncer.Affiliation table - Tooltip: Database table name of the work unit
syncer.Avatar base URL - Tooltip: URL prefix for the avatar images
syncer.Database type - Tooltip: Database type, supporting all databases supported by XORM, such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Oracle, SQLite, etc.
syncer.SSL mode - Tooltip: The SSL mode used when connecting to the database
syncer.Table columns - Tooltip: Columns in the table involved in data synchronization. Columns that are not involved in synchronization do not need to be added

system.An Identity and Access Management (IAM): An Identity and Access Management (IAM) / Single-Sign-On (SSO) platform with web UI supporting OAuth 2.0, OIDC, SAML and CAS

user.3rd-party logins - Tooltip: Social logins linked by the user
user.Affiliation - Tooltip: Employer, such as company name or organization name
user.Is admin - Tooltip: Is an administrator of the organization the user belongs to
user.Is deleted - Tooltip: Soft-deleted users only retain database records and cannot perform any operations
user.Is forbidden - Tooltip: Forbidden users cannot log in any more
user.Need update password - Tooltip: Force user update password after login
user.The password must contain at least one s: The password must contain at least one special character
user.The password must contain at least one u: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one digit
user.The password must have at least 6 charac: The password must have at least 6 characters
user.The password must have at least 8 charac: The password must have at least 8 characters
user.The password must not contain any repeat: The password must not contain any repeated characters
user.This field value doesn't match the patte: This field value doesn't match the pattern rule
user.Title: Title
Two passwords you typed do not match.
user.Upload ID card with person picture: Upload ID card with person picture
user.You have changed the username, please sa: You have changed the username, please save your change first before modifying the password

webhook.Is user extended - Tooltip: Whether to include the user's extended fields in the JSON
webhook.Single org only - Tooltip: Triggered only in the organization that the webhook belongs to
